item.name: Fancy Key
item.desc: a brass key, with an ornate design.

item.name: Blank Key
item.desc: a simple key, with no teeth cut in it yet.

item.name: Skeleton Key
item.desc: an elaborate key, made of ivory. Its teeth are constantly changing.

item.name: Deck of Cards
item.desc: a standard deck of 52 playing cards.

item.name: Folders A-K
item.desc: a collection of standard, manilla folders. They contain papers filed between A and K.

item.name: Folders L-P
item.desc: a collection of standard, manilla folders. They contain papers filed between L and P.

item.name: Folders Q-Z
item.desc: a collection of standard, manilla folders. They contain papers filed between Q and Z.

item.name: Bureau
item.desc: a free-standing dresser, made of wood and has 6 drawers.

item.name: Box of Cards
item.desc: a small cardboard box, for holding a deck of playing cards.

item.name: Filing Cabinet
item.desc: a two meter tall, metal filing cabinet. It has three drawers.
